DOC.brief_summary: Long-term cognitive outcome study of children who participated in randomized trials of LCP-supplemented formula during infancy.
DOC.brief_title: Allergy and Asthma Following Children Who Were Fed Supplemented Infant Formula
DOC.criteria: children previously randomized in a clinical study consuming LCPsupplemented infant formula children who did not previously participate in a randomized clinical study consuming LCPsupplemented infant formula
